message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $130. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While I believe $130 is a fair price, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $125?
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. I can do $120, but that's my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110.
